trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Baltimore
There were no other sightings in Baltimore on or around
divs: sighting detailsa good friend of mine, an old fishing buddy, told me a story about fishing at loch raven resevoir, years ago, when he witnessed a bright ufo fly up out of resevoir, out of the water, hover over the water and then fly off. he said it was at night, and the light was very brilliant. he is a straight shooter, in his 50's and would not lie. i was always fascinated with the story, being a ufo believer myself. now i have read that others have seen ufo's in that same resevoir. here's an article about two different sightings there, neither of which are the one my friend saw. see: http:\\www.waterufo.net\item.php?id=112
Summary: UFO flies up out of Loch Raven Reservoir at night, hovers, and flies off.
